title: SteelClock Configuration
description: Configuration schema for SteelClock v2 - display manager for SteelSeries devices

game_name.description: Internal game name for GameSense registration

game_display_name.description: Display name shown in SteelSeries GG

refresh_rate_ms.description: Display refresh rate in milliseconds. GameSense: min 100ms (10Hz). Direct: min 30ms (33Hz).

unregister_on_exit.description: Unregister from GameSense API on exit (may cause timeout)

deinitialize_timer_ms.description: Timeout for game deactivation after last event (1000-60000ms)

backend.description: Backend: 'gamesense' (requires SteelSeries GG), 'direct' (USB HID), 'any' (try gamesense, fallback to direct)

vid.description: USB Vendor ID in hex (e.g., '1038'). Auto-detect if omitted.

pid.description: USB Product ID in hex (e.g., '1612'). Auto-detect if omitted.

bundled_font_url.description: Custom URL for downloading bundled font (null = use default)

defaults.description: Default values inherited by all widgets

colors.description: Named colors that widgets can reference with @name syntax

padding.description: Padding from widget edges in pixels

font.description: Font name or TTF path (null = bundled font)

speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second

gap.description: Gap in pixels between text repetitions (continuous mode)

word_break.description: How to break lines: normal (break on spaces) or break-all (break anywhere)

timeout.description: Seconds to show notification (0 = until next message)

enabled.description: Enable notifications from this chat type

whitelist.description: Always show notifications from these IDs, even if this chat type is disabled

blacklist.description: Never show notifications from these IDs, even if this chat type is enabled

poll_interval.description: Internal polling interval for volume/volume_meter widgets (seconds)

mode.description: Display mode: text, analog clock face, binary clock, or seven-segment display

face.description: Clock face outline color (-1 to hide)

style.description: Binary style: BCD (per-digit 4-bit) or true binary (whole number)

layout.description: Layout: vertical (bits top-to-bottom) or horizontal (bits left-to-right)

history.description: Number of data points to display

margin.description: Margin between core bars in pixels

border.description: Draw border around each core bar

history.description: Number of data points to display

interface.description: Network interface name (sum all interfaces if omitted)

max_speed_mbps.description: Maximum speed in Mbps for scaling

show_unit.description: Show unit suffix (e.g., 'Mbps') in text mode

history.description: Number of data points to display

colors.description: Graph colors for RX/TX (-1 = line only/no fill)

gauge.description: Gauge mode settings (dual gauge: outer for RX, inner for TX)

disk.description: Disk/drive to monitor (sum all disks if omitted)

max_speed_mbps.description: Maximum speed in MB/s for scaling (-1 for auto)

show_unit.description: Show unit suffix (e.g., 'MB/s') in text mode

history.description: Number of data points to display

colors.description: Graph colors for read/write (-1 = line only/no fill)

mode.description: Display mode for audio peak meter

divider.description: Divider line color between left/right channels (-1=disabled, 0-255=color)

db_scale.description: Use logarithmic dB scale instead of linear

silence_threshold.description: Threshold below which audio is considered silent

mode.description: Display mode: spectrum analyzer or oscilloscope

frequency_compensation.description: Boost high frequencies for visual balance

enabled.description: Show peak hold indicators on bars

error_threshold.description: Consecutive errors before audio failure (default: 30, ~3 seconds)

on.description: Text when Caps Lock is on (null = embedded glyph)

off.description: Text when Caps Lock is off (null = embedded glyph)

on.description: Text when Num Lock is on (null = embedded glyph)

off.description: Text when Num Lock is off (null = embedded glyph)

on.description: Text when Scroll Lock is on (null = embedded glyph)

off.description: Text when Scroll Lock is off (null = embedded glyph)

on.description: Color when indicator is active (-1 to hide)

off.description: Color when indicator is inactive (-1 to hide)

format.description: Language code format: iso639-1 (EN), iso639-2 (ENG), or full (English)

wad.description: WAD file name (auto-downloads doom1.wad if not found)

bundled_wad_url.description: Custom URL for downloading DOOM shareware WAD (null = use default distro.ibiblio.org)

render_mode.description: Grayscale conversion mode for OLED display

posterize_levels.description: Number of gray levels for posterize mode (2-16)

gamma.description: Gamma value for gamma mode (0.1-3.0, >1 brightens midtones)

dither_size.description: Bayer matrix size for dither mode (2, 4, or 8)

text.description: Text rendering properties for Winamp widget

format.description: Format string with placeholders: {title} (track title), {filename} (file name), {filepath} (full path), {position} (MM:SS), {duration} (MM:SS), {position_ms} (ms), {duration_s} (seconds), {bitrate} (kbps), {samplerate} (Hz), {channels} (count), {status} (Playing/Paused/Stopped), {track_num} (current track number in playlist), {playlist_length} (total tracks in playlist), {shuffle} ('S' if enabled, empty otherwise), {repeat} ('R' if enabled, empty otherwise), {version} (Winamp version string)

placeholder.description: What to show when Winamp is not playing

text.description: Text to display when mode is 'text'

auto_show.description: Events that trigger the widget to appear (when auto_hide is enabled)

on_pause.description: Show widget when playback is paused

on_seek.description: Show widget when user seeks to different position

speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second

mode.description: Scroll mode: continuous (loop), bounce (reverse at edges), pause_ends (pause at start/end)

pause_ms.description: Pause duration at ends in milliseconds (for bounce/pause_ends modes)

gap.description: Gap between text repetitions in pixels (for continuous mode)

charset.description: Character set to use for the rain effect

density.description: Column density (0.0-1.0) - probability of a column being active

min_speed.description: Minimum fall speed in pixels per frame

max_speed.description: Maximum fall speed in pixels per frame

trail_fade.description: Trail fade factor (0.0-1.0) - how quickly characters fade

char_change_rate.description: Probability of a character changing per frame (0.0-1.0)

font_size.description: Font size: 'small' (3x5 pixels), 'large' (5x7 pixels), or 'auto' (based on display height)

api_key.description: API key for OpenWeatherMap (required for openweathermap provider)

city.description: City name (e.g., 'London' or 'New York,US'). Only supported with openweathermap provider.

icon_size.description: Weather icon size in pixels (16 or 24)

format.description: Display format string(s) with tokens. Can be a single string or array of strings (for cycling). Available tokens: {icon} (weather icon), {temp} (temperature), {feels} (feels like temp), {humidity} (humidity %), {wind} (wind speed), {wind_dir} (wind direction), {pressure} (pressure), {visibility} (visibility), {condition} (weather condition text), {description} (detailed description), {aqi} (air quality index), {aqi_level} (AQI level text), {uv} (UV index), {uv_level} (UV level text), {forecast:graph} (temperature graph), {forecast:icons} (forecast day icons), {forecast:scroll} (scrolling forecast). Use \n for multi-line layouts.

interval.description: Seconds between format changes (0 to disable cycling)

forecast.description: Forecast display settings (auto-enabled when forecast tokens are used in format)

hours.description: Number of hours for hourly forecast

days.description: Number of days for daily forecast

scroll_speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second for {forecast:scroll}

mode.description: Display mode: battery (progressbar in battery shape), text, bar, gauge, graph

low_threshold.description: Percentage below which battery is considered low

critical_threshold.description: Percentage below which battery is considered critical

colors.description: Color settings for battery display (0-255, 0=black supported)

normal.description: Fill color when battery is normal

low.description: Fill color when battery is low

critical.description: Fill color when battery is critical

show_economy.description: Display mode for economy/power saver indicator

show_plugged.description: Display mode for AC power indicator

notify_duration.description: Seconds to show indicator in notify modes

bar.description: Bar mode settings (use direction: up/down for vertical orientation)

format.description: Format string with tokens: {percent}/{pct} (value), {status} (CHG/AC/ECO), {status_full} (Charging/AC Power/Economy), {time} (smart remaining), {time_left}, {time_to_full}, {time_left_min} (minutes), {level} (critical/low/normal), {charging}/{plugged}/{economy} (boolean indicators)

game_of_life.description: Conway's Game of Life cellular automaton settings

rules.description: Cellular automaton rules in B/S notation. B = birth neighbor counts, S = survival neighbor counts. Examples: 'B3/S23' (Conway), 'B36/S23' (HighLife), 'B1357/S1357' (Replicator)

wrap_edges.description: Wrap edges to form a torus topology (patterns wrap around)

random_density.description: Probability of cell being alive in random pattern (0.0-1.0)

cell_size.description: Pixels per cell (1-4). Larger = fewer cells but more visible

trail_effect.description: Enable fading trail when cells die (grayscale ghost effect)

trail_decay.description: Brightness decay per frame for dead cells (higher = faster fade)

restart_timeout.description: Seconds to wait before restarting when simulation ends (all cells dead or pattern stable). 0 = restart immediately, -1 = never restart

restart_mode.description: How to restart: 'reset' = use initial_pattern, 'inject' = add random cells to existing grid (keeps survivors), 'random' = always use fresh random pattern

star_count.description: Number of stars in the field

max_speed.description: Maximum star speed during hyperspace jump

center_x.description: Focal point X coordinate (null = widget center)

center_y.description: Focal point Y coordinate (null = widget center)

mode.description: Animation mode: 'continuous' (always in hyperspace), 'cycle' (phases: idle -> jump -> travel -> exit)

idle_time.description: Seconds in idle phase before jumping (cycle mode only)

travel_time.description: Seconds spent in hyperspace (cycle mode only)

acceleration.description: Speed change rate during jump/exit phases (cycle mode only)

starwars_intro.description: Star Wars opening crawl with pre-intro text, shrinking logo, and perspective text crawl

pre_intro.description: Pre-intro phase settings ('A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....')

text.description: The pre-intro message text (use \n for line breaks)
text.default: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....

hold.description: Hold duration in seconds after fade in

hold_before.description: Seconds to hold at full size before shrinking

stars.description: Background starfield settings (visible during logo and crawl)

text.description: Lines of text to display in the crawl

scroll_speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per frame

perspective.description: Perspective strength (0.0 = no perspective, 1.0 = maximum narrowing toward top)

slant.description: Text radial slant angle in degrees (characters lean toward center)

fade_top.description: Fade start position from top (0.0 = fade from very top, 1.0 = no fade)

loop.description: Loop the entire sequence when complete

pause_at_end.description: Seconds to pause after crawl completes before looping

telegram.description: Telegram notifications widget - displays messages from your Telegram account

counter.description: Unread counter display settings (for telegram_counter widget)

format.description: Display format: count (just the number), badge (Telegram paper airplane icon), text (N unread)

show_zero.description: Whether to show when unread count is 0

telegram.description: Telegram counter widget - displays unread message count

phone_number.description: Phone number in international format, e.g., +1234567890

format.description: Display format: count (just the number), badge (Telegram paper airplane icon), text (N unread)

show_zero.description: Whether to show when unread count is 0
